thread.title: The 18 best tweets I saw this week. But only one can be chosen the best.
thread.title_full: The 18 best tweets I saw this week. But only one can be chosen the best.

author: Eric Zorn
title: The 18 best tweets I saw this week. But only one can be chosen the best.
text:
The 18 best tweets I saw this week. But only one can be chosen the best. A still from 'Breaking Amish' Discovery Eric Zorn 
To receive an email alert each week when this poll goes live, just and I'll put you on the Change of Subject newsletter list! You can also go to the Trib's newsletter subscription page to sign up. 
Click the box next to each tweet that amuses you -- no limit to the number of choices. Voting closes Friday at noon. 
If you see a tweet that's been plagiarized or is falsely attributed, please alert me in a note to ericzorn@gmail.com. Copyright Â© 2017, Chicago Tribune
